Package com.helml.trektris.server

Class TetrisArena

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.helml.trektris.server.TetrisArena

  • public class TetrisArena
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rectangular tetris gaming arena. The coordinate system used has its origin in the upper left corner with the x-axis pointing to the right and the y axis pointing downwards. Each field holds an integer value, where 0 means the field is empty and 1-7 represents the color codes of the 7 different Tetrominos.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Thomas Helml
    See Also:
    Tetromino

      • TetrisArena

        public TetrisArena​(int w,

        w - width of the arena
        h - height of the arena

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset​()
        Empties the arena by writing 0's into all fields

      • destroyLine

        private void destroyLine​(int y)
        Whenever an horizontal line is filled by the player, this method is called to eliminate the line with the given y-coordinate. All lines above are moved one row below.
        Parameters:
        y - The index of the line to eliminate

      • seekAndDestroyLines

        public int seekAndDestroyLines​()
        Checks, if there are any full horizontal lines in the arena and eliminates all of them. Alle lines above the eliminated line are moved down a row
        Returns:
        The amount of lines eliminiated.

      • checkTetronimo

        public boolean checkTetronimo​(Tetromino t,
                              int x_new,
                              int y_new)
        Checks, whether a Tetromino could be placed within the area on a given position.
        Parameters:
        t - tetromino to check
        x_new - x position to check tetromino
        y_new - y position to check tetromino
        Returns:
        true, if the Tetromino could be placed on coordinates (x_new/y_new), otherwise false

      • setTetronimo

        public boolean setTetronimo​(Tetromino t,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Copys a Tetromino into the Arena at the area on a given position.
        Parameters:
        t - tetromino to check
        x - x position to check Tetromino
        y - y position to check Tetromino
        Returns:
        true, if the Tetromino could be placed on coordinates (x_new/y_new), otherwise false

      • addLines

        public boolean addLines​(int lines)
        Adds 'lines' lines to the arena bottom up. Added lines will have random colors and at least one "missing" element.
        Parameters:
        lines - the amount of lines to add to the Arena
        Returns:
        true, if the lines could be added, because there is enough space to add them. false will indicate a game over

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString​()
        Overwrites the toString() method
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The String representation of the Arena

      • toArray

        public int[][] toArray​()
        Returns the arena as int-array representation.
        Returns:
        int-array representing the current tetris arena
